name: Additional Development,附加开发

name: Base,基本
description: The standard installation.,

description: Smallest possible installation,最小安装

name: Development Tools,开发工具
description: A basic development environment.,基本开发环境。

DNS Name Server,DNS 名称服务器
description: This package group allows you to run a DNS name server (BIND) on the system.,该软件包组允许您在系统上运行 DNS 名称服务器(BIND)。

description: Clients for integration into a network managed by a directory service.,用于整合到使用目录服务管理的网络的客户端。

description: openGauss is an open source relational database management system.,openGauss一款开源的关系数据库管理系统。

name: Fonts,字体
description: Fonts packages for rendering text on the desktop.,用于在桌面显示文字的字体软件包。

name: FTP Server,FTP 服务器
description: These tools allow you to run an FTP server on the system.,这些工具允许您在系统上运行 FTP 服务器。

name: GNOME Applications,GNOME 应用程序
description: A set of commonly used GNOME Applications.,一组经常使用的 GNOME 应用程序。

name: GNOME,GNOME
description: GNOME is a highly intuitive and user friendly desktop environment.,GNOME 是一个非常直观且用户友好的桌面环境。

name: Guest Desktop Agents,虚拟机桌面代理
description: Agents used when running as a virtualized desktop.,作为虚拟桌面运行时使用的代理。

name: Hardware Monitoring Utilities,硬件监控工具
description: A set of tools to monitor server hardware.,一组用来监控服务器硬件的工具。

name: Hardware Support,
description: This group is a collection of tools for various hardware specific utilities.,

name: Headless Management,无图形终端系统管理工具
description: Tools for managing the system without an attached graphical console.,用于管理无图像终端系统的工具。

name: Infiniband Support,Infiniband 支持
description: Software designed for supporting clustering, grid connectivity, and low-latency, high bandwidth storage using RDMA-based InfiniBand, iWARP, RoCE, and OPA fabrics.,

name: Input Methods,输入法
description: Input method packages for the input of international text.,输入非英文文本的输入法软件包

name: Internet Applications,互联网应用程序
description: Email, chat, and video conferencing software.,电子邮件、聊天和视频会议软件。

name: Internet Browser,互联网浏览器
description: The Firefox web browser,Firefox web 浏览器

name: Java Platform,Java 平台
description: Java support for the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server and Desktop Platforms.,Red Hat Enterprise Linux 服务器和桌面平台的 Java 支持。

name: Large Systems Performance,大系统性能
description: Performance support tools for large systems.,用于大型系统的性能支持工具。

name: Legacy UNIX Compatibility,传统 UNIX 兼容性
description: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy UNIX environments.,用于从继承 UNIX 环境中迁移或者可用于该环境的兼容程序。

description: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy X Window System environments.,用于从继承 X Windows 环境中迁移或者可用于该环境的兼容程序。

name: Common NetworkManager submodules,
description: This group contains NetworkManager submodules that are commonly used, but may not be wanted in some streamlined configurations.,

name: Platform Development,平台开发

name: Printing Client,打印客户端

name: Python Web,

name: Scientific Support,科学记数法支持

name: Server product core,
description: Packages mandatory for the server product.,
